title: Gamification-Based Language Education Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education experience and understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: In-service elementary teachers design and implement gamification-based language education projects to motivate learners.

learning_goals: Learners can design language education projects utilizing gamification elements (challenges, reward systems, storytelling).
Learners develop three or more gamification activities that promote self-directed learning.
Learners validate the effectiveness of gamification projects through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
